I started this on the back of 150+/100+ BP readings. Within a week of taking this, my BP shot up to 170+/115+. Plus I constantly get bad headaches and shoulder tension. Stopped it and BP went back to 150+/100+ almost immediately. I don't know why it's worse for me though. I tried again, this time with 2 tablets in the morning, instead of one I'd normally take. My BP taken in the afternoon was 135/95 and 129/99. Wow! I've never had such low readings ever. Guess the dosage is important. Will continue to monitor.

I have been taking this product for years.  It really works.  I take 2 pills a day in the morning.  My blood pressure has been down since I started taking them.  I have chronic kidney disease and my blood pressure was a contributor, and I was taking four different prescription drugs.  Now I am on only 2 including tis formula.  I am a happy customer.

I have been taking this product to lower my blood pressure ever since I lost my insurance and couldn't afford the multiple prescriptions I was taking. To my surprise, this product actually lowered my blood pressure better than the 3 prescriptions I was on. I take 1 capsule twice a day.  I keep it on hand all of the time.

My BP was averaging in the 160s/100's and was often in the 180s. After a month on this, with no other lifestyle changes, and no other supplements or drugs, my average BP is 135/85.
I have been taking two pills in the AM and two at night.

In my difficult case it did not lower blood pressure for two weeks. But the ingredients are very good and they must work if this supplement is taken for a long time, by improving the elasticity of the vessels, lowering cholesterol and inflammation. It should not be taken together with prescribed blood pressure medicines, but in three hours or so. I found that they do not make friends.

review_title: Bell Lifestyle Blood Pressure Formula Combo (BEL-10908)
review_text:
Dear Sir:
A fine product except for the fact that the fish meal used was too much of a blood thinner, in my case.  
Took a while for a minor cut to stop bleeding.  Fish oil capsules have the same effect on me.  Maybe its me.
I will try another of your products in the future, God willing.
Thank you.

Thanks

review_title: Lowered my pressure down in less than a month
review_text:

I'm thrilled, needless to say.  I've ordered a second bottle just to keep my run of good health and luck rolling.  Best I've found so far!!
